name: Hell Home
description:
Hell Home is a prototype of a strategy game where you need to defend your dungeon from the waves of enemies attacking. 

You have 2 types of troops, the ogres (melee) and the Karens (range). You can have up to 6 warriors in total at any time. You can create more troops by clicking on the images on the left bottom of the screen.

The walls can also be broken down by going inside the editor mode. To access the editor mode press b, and press b again to go out of it. There is a point in the middle of the screen that selects the wall to be broken down and highlights it. Left click to select the wall to break. You can cancel breaking down the wall by clicking on the wall again.

Controls:

Move around map: A, W, S, D

Select units: Left Click

Move units: Left Click

Deselect units: Right Click

Attack Units: Left Click

if you want to break walls press the button "edit mode" or press b and then Left Click on top of the walls (uses center of screen not mouse).
